Package CPS.Street

Interface Street

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArrayListStreet, LDLinkedStreet, LinkedListStreet
public interface Street
This class represents a city with a two sided street. Has Read/Write and a View mode. Stores buildings as an AbstractBuilding object.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static class 
    Street.AbstractBuilding
    Abstract class to be the super class of every building object in the street.
    static enum 
    Street.Mode
    Enum to represent the editting modes of the program
    static enum 
    Street.Side
    Enum to represent the sides of the streets

    • add

      boolean add(Street.AbstractBuilding building, int position, Street.Side side) throws CPSException.InvalidPositionException, CPSException.ReadOnlyException
      Add a building to the specified position in the specified side.

      Parameters:
      building -
      position -
      side -
      Returns:
      true on succes, false if the position is inapropriate.
      Throws:
      CPSException.InvalidPositionException - When the position is out of bounds.
      CPSException.ReadOnlyException - When called in Read_Only mode.

    • remove

      Street.AbstractBuilding remove(int index, Street.Side side) throws CPSException.ReadOnlyException
      Remove the building with the given index in the specified side.

      Indexes start from 0.

      Parameters:
      index -
      side -
      Returns:
      The removed building.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - When the given index is out of bounds.
      CPSException.ReadOnlyException - When called in Read_Only mode.

    • remove_Position

      Street.AbstractBuilding remove_Position(int position, Street.Side side) throws CPSException.InvalidPositionException, CPSException.ReadOnlyException
      Remove the building in the given position on the street in the specified side.

      positions can start from 0, and end in the the length of the street.

      Parameters:
      position -
      side -
      Returns:
      The removed building.
      Throws:
      CPSException.InvalidPositionException - When the given position is out of bounds of the street.
      CPSException.ReadOnlyException - When called in Read_Only mode.
